H0.text: In which film did Roger Moore first play James Bond. Goldfinger

H1.text: In which film did Roger Moore first play James Bond. On Her Majesty's Secret Service

H2.text: In which film did Roger Moore first play James Bond. Thunderball

H3.text: In which film did Roger Moore first play James Bond. LALD

A4.text: Live and Let Die (film), a 1973 film starring Roger Moore

A5.text: Moore made his second Bond film, The Man with the Golden Gun (1974), which was a hit, though less successful than Live and Let Die.

A6.text: George Lazenby was cast in 1969's On Her Majesty's Secret Service.
